Text:
Hi,
Thank you for sharing this.
But I believe you have incorrectly uploaded the French subs instead of the English (as mentioned).
Can you please add / re-upload the English one?

I tried the English subs available on other sites, but their timing is all messed up.

Thanks again for the upload.
Cheers!

Thanks for your efforts.

There are no English subtitles included.

Could you please add the subtitles, or else update the torrent description so that others are not misled?
